The image in question shows PM Modi bowi: but the claim that she is Priti Adani, the chairperson of Adani Foundation, is being questioned.
The text inscribed on the image reads: देश की बागडोर एक नई जमात ने संभाली है. (A new group has taken over the reins of the country).” This text is being used to support the claim.
The image has been widely shared on Face: and it has gained significant attention and circulation.
Through various investigations: including a Google reverse image search and verification from multiple sources, it has been determined that the woman in the photograph is not Priti Adani but Geeta Rudresh, the then-Mayor of Tumkur city in Karnataka.
